subtitleNullable: Best dataset for building Predictive models, Recommendation systems or report.
descriptionNullable:
Available Dataset **having 9000+ rows**, containing featuring details of used cars available on [OLX website](https://www.olx.com.pk/cars_c84) for sale. Datasets belongs to cars mostly used in **Pakistan**, captures real data without any dummy entries. Dataset contains car details of **11 famous companies** e.g., Suzuki, Toyota, Honda, Hyundai, Daihatsu and Mercedes etc. Further, company models are also mentioned such as Suzuki company models are Bolan, Alto, Wagon R, Swift, Baleno etc.

## **What you can do with this dataset?**
- Best for building powerful Regression model with target variable of Prices or other according to your requirement.
- Recommendation system
- Generate In-depth Data Analysis Report 

## Key Attributes:
- Car ID and its Name
- Model
- Company
- Year of Purchase
- KM's driven
- Price
- Fuel type
- Registration city
- Transmission
- Condition means car is used or new
- Seller Location
- Features of cars
- Images of selling car
- Car page as a proof for ensuring that information is real


>You can add or remove columns for efficient model building.
